title: My sister started playing GP and says...
body:
She says shes the best GP on Oceania and feeds only because she doesnt have a skin on gangplank, I didnt agree with what she was saying and i say shes a liar but she said that im just a little girl and i know nothing.. ! 

Can someone gift her a gangplank skin to make her be quiet please?! Her name is "Arclight Vayne" thanks >:[ lets hit an end to these deceitful lies !!

replies.body:
rank doesnt determine how much $ you have
 :O

She has spent over $600 tho
do you know who doesn't use skins and doesn't feed because of it? faker
You wouldn't understand, some champions are smooth with skins, or you can only play the champion to the maximum output if you have the skin, a good example is riven, with arcade it's the only way :)
This person knows, I'm a well known riven main and arcade is the only skin that I feel comfortable on.
It's just her other account I've already argued with her about this she is a scam artist elo digger asshole.

Who r u ? I don't even know you & neither does Tiffany ! ! !

stop lying {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Ayyy this guy knows, I believe the term is E-Tease because you're right I wouldn't do anything with anyone online. I have a boyfriend and I'm happy
Bam disproved your troll attempt in the same thread as you troll? Get da fuck outta here.
